articles.description: England interim manager Lee Carsley can reflect on a mission accomplished as he lays the foundations for incoming head coach Thomas Tuchel.
articles.title: Lee Carsley: Mission accomplished as England foundations laid for Thomas Tuchel

articles.description: Wales sink to an all-time results low in their 143-year international rugby history with a heavy loss to Australia in Cardiff with Warren Gatland under pressure.
articles.title: Wales 20-52 Australia: Warren Gatland's side sink to new low

articles.description: Adrien Rabiot scores two headers as France beat Italy at the San Siro to overtake the Azzurri and win Nations League Group A2.
articles.title: Nations League: Adrien Rabiot double seals top spot for France as they beat Italy

articles.description: Emma Raducanu puts Great Britain ahead against defending champions Canada as they pursue a spot in the Billie Jean King Cup semi-finals.
articles.title: Billie Jean King Cup 2024: Emma Raducanu puts Great Britain in front against Canada in Malaga

articles.description: Erling Haaland scores a hat-trick as Norway thrash Kazakhstan to seal promotion to the top flight of the Nations League.
articles.title: Norway 5-0 Kazakhstan: Erling Haaland scores hat-trick to seal promotion

articles.description: The fifth T20 between West Indies and England is abandoned because of rain, giving the visitors a 3-1 series win.
articles.title: West Indies vs England: Fifth T20 washed out by rain as visitors win series 3-1

articles.description: Teenager Luke Littler continues his sensational maiden professional year by winning the Grand Slam of Darts with a 16-3 trashing of qualifier Martin Lukeman.
articles.title: Grand Slam of Darts results: Luke Littler thrashes Martin Lukeman to go fifth in Order of Merit

articles.description: Italian world number one Jannik Sinner beats American Taylor Fritz in straight sets to win his first ATP Finals title in Turin.
articles.title: ATP Finals: World number one Jannik Sinner beats Taylor Fritz in Turin

articles.description: After what he admits was the most emotionally draining season of his career, Rory McIlroy still feels only those who had "career years" enjoyed more success than him in 2024.
articles.title: DP World Tour Championship - Rory McIlroy feels only two players had better years in 2024

articles.description: Wales head coach Warren Gatland says he will think about his future following the record defeat against Australia in Cardiff.
articles.title: Warren Gatland: Wales head coach considers future after record loss.
